    Our Room

    Discover our luxurious rooms, designed for your comfort and relaxation.

    Hotel Policies

    Smoke-Free Property

    Smoking inside the rooms is strictly prohibited and attracts a fine of 100,000 Naira.

    No Fighting or Abuse

    Fighting or any form of abuse will result in immediate eviction without a refund.

    Loss of Key

    Losing your sensor card key attracts a fine of N20,000. Locking it inside the room attracts a fine of N1,000. Deposit your key at reception when going out or checking out.

    Constituting Nuisance

    Using the room for offensive, noisy, dangerous, illegal, or improper purposes is not allowed. Violators will be evicted without refunds.

    Damage of Property

    Any damage incurred during your stay will be assessed, and fines will be applied accordingly.

    Room Inspection

    The room condition must be inspected before check-out.

    Our Restaurant

    Experience fine dining with a blend of exquisite flavors and elegant ambiance.

    Luxury Dining Experience

    Our hotel restaurant offers a diverse menu crafted by top chefs, featuring gourmet dishes made from fresh, locally sourced ingredients.

    • International Cuisine
    • Premium Wine Selection
    • Live Music & Entertainment
    Reserve a Table
